query: SELECT id, tweet_text, source_news_url, posted_at FROM posted_tweets ORDER BY posted_at DESC LIMIT 10;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3tgv6NbJQ4yLEzD.c8a05f3e07a3 --database eq2K3uhXAnhKkfx8kHCxLL --execute SELECT id, tweet_text, source_news_url, posted_at FROM posted_tweets ORDER BY posted_at DESC LIMIT 10;
messages: 210001	NASA is sharing new comet pics. Meanwhile, I still can't get a clear photo of my neighbor's cat stealing my Amazon packages. Priorities, people! #3IATLAS #SpaceNews

Source: https://spaceanddefense.io/nasa-to-share-comet-3i-atlas-images-from-spacecraft-telescopes/	https://spaceanddefense.io/nasa-to-share-comet-3i-atlas-images-from-spacecraft-telescopes/	2025-11-20 07:57:51
180001	A 984ft cargo ship took down a major bridge because of ONE faulty wire. My charging cable has more structural integrity. #BaltimoreBridge #Dali

Source: https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/11/19/single-faulty-wire-led-cargo-ship-to-crash-into-baltimore-bridge-report	https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/11/19/single-faulty-wire-led-cargo-ship-to-crash-into-baltimore-bridge-report	2025-11-20 07:51:09
150001	COP30 agreed! We’ve successfully committed to saving the planet, starting right after we fly home on 190 private jets. #ClimateAction #BindingCommitments
Source: https://www.bbc.com/news/world	https://www.bbc.com/news/world	2025-11-19 12:20:23
120001	Trump threatening to sue the BBC over an edit is peak irony. Finally, someone is holding the media accountable for... *checks notes*... basic video production.
Source: https://www.bbc.com/news/world	https://www.bbc.com/news/world	2025-11-16 19:01:05
90002	Great news! We found new life forms deep underwater. Now back to arguing about who owns the parking spot on Mars. #DeepSea #Priorities
Source: https://www.bbc.com/news/science_and_environment	https://www.bbc.com/news/science_and_environment	2025-11-16 01:32:28
90001	Mission accomplished: We successfully disrupted the free market supply chain of illicit substances. Also, four people are gone. Priorities!
Source: https://www.cbsnews.com/	https://www.cbsnews.com/	2025-11-16 01:31:21
60001	The ultimate betrayal: When your political cult leader unfollows you. MTG is learning that loyalty is only a one-way street on Truth Social. #GOPDrama
Source: https://time.com/	https://time.com/	2025-11-16 01:23:15
30001	BREAKING: Global Climate Summit reaches 'historic agreement' to meet again next year and discuss the possibility of maybe doing something...
Source: https://example.com/climate-summit	https://example.com/climate-summit	2025-11-09 01:02:25
2	BREAKING: Global leaders agree to strongly consider reducing emissions by 2050, provided it doesn't inconvenience Q4 profits. #ClimateAct...
Source: https://example.com/climate-summit	https://example.com/climate-summit	2025-11-09 00:50:39
1	BREAKING: World leaders sign 'Historic Climate Pact,' promising to start caring *really* hard by 2050. Our grandkids will be thrilled! #C...
Source: https://example.com/climate-summit	https://example.com/climate-summit	2025-11-09 00:44:32
